title: Fix missing colors on buttons and boxes

requirements.text: Restore background colors and border colors to all button elements across the application. Buttons should render with visible colors matching the OKLCH color system defined in the index.css file.

quotes: All the boxes and buttons are blank without colours

acceptanceCriteria: All buttons display with appropriate background colors
Button hover states show visible color changes
Button text has sufficient contrast against backgrounds

requirements.text: Restore background colors and border colors to all card and box components (including product cards, diet plan cards, recommendation sections, and form containers). All boxes should render with visible styling matching the design system.

quotes: All the boxes and buttons are blank without colours

acceptanceCriteria: Product cards display with visible borders and backgrounds
Diet plan selection cards show proper styling
Health goal selection buttons render with visible colors
Form containers and input boxes have visible borders

requirements.text: Ensure the OKLCH color system variables defined in frontend/index.css are properly applied throughout all components. Verify that CSS custom properties (--color-primary, --color-surface, etc.) are correctly referenced in component styles.
acceptanceCriteria: All components correctly reference CSS custom properties
Both light and dark mode color variables are functional
No hardcoded color values override the design system

constraints: Do not modify the OKLCH color definitions in frontend/index.css
Maintain existing component structure and functionality
Preserve all existing hover and interaction states
nonGoals: Changing the color palette or design system
